login.text: Sign in with your Exaltio account:

requestResetPassword.failure: Failed to request a password reset.
requestResetPassword.success: A password reset link has been send to your email address.

requestVerifyEmail.failure: Failed to resend the verfication email.
requestVerifyEmail.success: A email verification link has been send to your email address.

resetPassword.success: Successfully changed your password. You can sign in to your account now.

verifyEmail.failure: Failed to verify your email address.
verifyEmail.success: Successfully verified your email address. You can sign in to your account now.
